properties.entry: SELECT id, name, salary_cap, sport, auction_length, bid_time_ext, bid_time_buff, draft_status FROM leagues WHERE id = :leagueId
SELECT id, name, salary_cap, sport, auction_length, bid_time_ext, bid_time_buff, draft_status FROM leagues WHERE name = :leagueName
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM positions WHERE leagueid = :leagueId
SELECT t.id,t.name,t.num_adds,t.money_plusminus FROM teams t WHERE t.leagueid = :leagueId
SELECT t.id,t.name,t.num_adds,t.money_plusminus FROM teams t WHERE t.leagueid = :leagueId AND t.id = :teamId
UPDATE teams SET name = :name, num_adds = :adds, money_plusminus = :budgetAdjustment WHERE leagueid = :leagueId AND id = :teamId

SELECT p.playerid,p.name,p.position,p.team AS realTeam,p.rank, pw.price,t.id AS teamId FROM players_won pw JOIN players p ON pw.playerid=p.playerid JOIN teams t ON t.id=pw.teamid WHERE pw.leagueid = :leagueId
SELECT id FROM passwd WHERE openid=:openIdToken
SELECT id FROM teams WHERE ownerid=:userId AND leagueid=:leagueId

SELECT p.playerid,p.name,p.position,p.team AS realTeam, p.rank, t.id AS teamId,t.name AS team,ap.price,ap.time FROM auction_players ap JOIN players p ON ap.playerid=p.playerid JOIN teams t ON ap.teamid=t.id WHERE ap.leagueid = :leagueId
UPDATE auction_players SET time=:expirationTime, teamid=:teamId, price=:amount WHERE playerid=:playerId AND leagueid=:leagueId
SELECT playerid,name,position,team,rank FROM players WHERE playerid=:playerId AND active=1

SELECT p.playerid, p.name, p.position, p.team, p.rank FROM players p JOIN leagues l ON p.sport=l.sport LEFT JOIN players_won pw ON l.id = pw.leagueid AND p.playerid = pw.playerid LEFT JOIN auction_players ap ON l.id = ap.leagueid AND p.playerid = ap.playerid WHERE l.id=:leagueId AND ap.playerid IS NULL AND pw.playerid IS NULL AND p.active = 1 ORDER BY rank
